name: Amazing Grave
description:
Amazing Grave is an asymmetrical competitive multiplayer game.

Join your friends in robbing a procedurally generated pyramid, find the gem and avoid the mummy!

Goblins

Try to find a gem in one of the many sarcophagi.

  • Opening doors is slow.
  • Goblins can only stun a Mummy.
  • Only one Goblin can win!

Mummies

Try to defeat the looters by attacking them

  • Opening doors is fast.
  • Mummies walk slower.
  • Mummies can kill Goblins in one hit!
  • Mummies can hide in sarcophagi to ambush!

Host server:

  • One player starts “Host (server + client)”
  • Make sure the host has port 7777 opened!
  • Don’t know your IP? https://whatismyipaddress.com/

Join server:

  • Join by entering the host’s IP and select “Client”
